name: React Hydration Fix
observations: Hydration error occurred due to Math.random() producing different server vs client results
Fixed by using useState with initial non-randomized data
Added useEffect to shuffle team members after component mounts
This ensures server and client render the same initial content
Randomization happens after hydration completes successfully
UI Glitch Resolution: Fixed visual jump/glitch that occurred when team randomization happened after client render
Solution: Implemented deterministic seeded randomization using daily seed based on current date
Technical Details: Replaced Math.random() with seeded Linear Congruential Generator (LCG) algorithm
Benefits: Server and client render identical content, no hydration mismatch, order still changes daily
Implementation: Used getDailySeed() function returning year*1000 + dayOfYear for consistent daily variation
